response:
"warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unsere personenbezogenen daten sammeln und verkaufen? #datenschutz #privatsphäre #sicherheit"

translation: "why are there still companies that collect and sell our personal data? #dataprotection #privacy #security"

this post critically examines the issue of companies collecting and selling personal data without proper consent or regard for privacy. it questions the lack of effective regulations and measures to protect individuals' personal information in the digital age. the hashtags #datenschutz (data protection), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #sicherheit (security) are used to reach a wider audience and encourage discussion on the topic.
